page.title: 08MORE FARMING ROUND CLOPHILL
page.content: Other farms in our area grow crops such as{barley, wheat}&{oil seed rape which is used in making vegetable oil. Some grow vegetables for the{London}& local markets. They grow our famous {Bedfordshire Brussel Sprouts, beans, {cauliflowers}and{cabbages}as big as footballs. There is an{orchard}which grows fine {worcesters, russets, egremonts, coxes &{bramleys}as well as other varieties. There is a{pig farm}at the top of Little Lane, and{sheep}in the fields behind the school and in Shefford Rd. Also a{Pick-it-yourself fruit farm which is busy in June and July. We weigh the children before and after picking{strawberries, raspberries, {gooseberries, redcurrants }and {blackcurrants. }
